answers.answer: Did you get your 3d ultra sound ?
No I haven't had a 4d ultrasound
In MN insurance only pays for 1 regular ultra sound. I would check with insurance snd your doctor. It can be very diffrent from place to place.
I am 25 w and I don't get another
How do they determine the baby is breech is no other US is done? (Might be a silly question)
They can determine by pushing on you belly to see what position the baby is in.
Yeah they can feel the position through your belly. I've had 2 ultrasounds since my 20 week one but that's only because I'm diabetic. Normally my hospital has the last one at 20 weeks.
They can feel the outside of your belly and when they check your cervix they should be able to feel the baby's fontanelle. There is also a big difference on the feeling of babies butt ha ha
I get my last one at 36wks
I'm having one today at 36+5wks but only because I have gestational diabetes and they want to check the size of the baby to see if I'm able to vbac
Thank you ladies all so much

question: Im 36 weeks todayDo I have another ultrasound prior to my delivery date?
title: Ultrasound
